subject: Football
Weather
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Vikings will play Monday night’s game against Chicago at TCF Bank Stadium on the campus of the University of Minnesota after it was determined that the Metrodome’s roof could not be repaired in time.
snippet: The Vikings will play Monday night’s game against Chicago at TCF Bank Stadium on the campus of the University of Minnesota after it was determined that the Metrodome’s roof could not be repaired in time.
